sentences.english: But Jesus made no reply, not even to a single charge--to the great amazement of the governor.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣仍不回答，连一句话也不说，以致巡抚甚觉希奇。

sentences.english: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣仍不回答，连一句话也不说，以致巡抚甚觉希奇。

sentences.english: When his disciples heard it, they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?
sentences.chinese: 门徒听见这话，就希奇得很，说，这样谁能得救呢。

sentences.english: See grandma home door open, she was very much were amazed at.
sentences.chinese: 看到奶奶家的屋门敞开着，她感到很希奇。

sentences.english: Artists Olinka Vistica and Drazen Grubisic are the founders of this museum.
sentences.chinese: 艺术家韦斯蒂卡和格鲁比希奇是这座博物馆的创始人。

sentences.english: I heard weird shrieks in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 我在黑暗中听到希奇的尖叫声。

sentences.english: His depiction of finance's failures is not novel- however it is well done.
sentences.chinese: 他对金融业失败的描述并不希奇，却相当到位。

sentences.english: And they were astonished at his doctrine: for his word was with power.
sentences.chinese: 他们很希奇他的教训，因为他的话里有权柄。

sentences.english: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?
sentences.chinese: 犹太人就希奇说，这个人没有学过，怎吗明白书呢。

sentences.english: What weird behaviour can gases display near absolute zero?
sentences.chinese: 什么样的希奇古怪的行为可以气化显示接近绝对零度？

sentences.english: This apparent defeat resulted in a marvelous victory.
sentences.chinese: 显著的失败的结果，反是希奇的胜利。

sentences.english: I thought that was pretty strange at first, but now I'm used to it.
sentences.chinese: 开始，我想那是太希奇了，但是现在我已经习惯了。

sentences.english: Jn. 3:13 Do not marvel, brothers, if the world hates you.
sentences.chinese: 约壹三13弟兄们，世人若恨你们，不要以为希奇。

sentences.english: Where the only thing bizarre are the donated items for sale.
sentences.chinese: 那里出售的捐赠品都是些希奇古怪的玩意儿。

sentences.english: The crowd was amazed and said, "Nothing like this has ever been seen in Israel.
sentences.chinese: 众人都希奇说，在以色列中，从来没有见过这样的事。

sentences.english: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.
sentences.chinese: 弟兄们，世人若恨你们，不要以为希奇。

definition: rare/uncommon/rarity/to value as a rarity/to cherish/Taiwan pr. [xi1 han3]
variant of 玩意兒|玩意儿[wan2 yi4 r5]
to make a fuss about nothing (idiom)
